item.description:
NHCer/professional pianist Alexis will be performing in concert along with an excellent violinist, Erika Stierli. Come see them free at 7:30pm in New Haven at the Neighborhood Music School. Approx. 1 hr long. After the concert they plan to go out for drinks.

They will be performing sonatas by Beethoven (#7 in C minor) and Prokofiev (sonata in D major).

HOST: Alexis, cell 203-747-9203...probably best to text her...she'll be teaching all day and may be unable to answer the phone before the concert, but may be able to reply to text messages. You can also ask questions by calling the school's main #, (203) 624-5189.

You can hear Alexis at her professional sites:
www.facebook.com/pages/Alexis-Zingale/41532426738 (this is her professional page, not her regular profile)
www.myspace.com/alexiszingalepianist

DIRECTIONS: For directions, click here

PARKING: Don't expect to find available street parking on Audubon St. (which is a 1-way street). Whitney, Grove, etc have street parking, and there are parking garages in the area (including on Audubon).
item.name: Thu. 5/28 - Alexis concert, drinks afterward
